雪.definition: snow; CL:場|场[chang2]; (literary) to wipe away (a humiliation etc)

雪上加霜.definition: (idiom) to make matters even worse; to add insult to injury

雪中送炭.definition: lit. to send charcoal in snowy weather (idiom); fig. to provide help in sb's hour of need

雪亮.definition: lit. bright as snow; shiny; dazzling; sharp (of eyes)

雪佛龍石油公司.pinyin: xuě fú lóng shí yóu gōng sī

雪山太子.definition: Meili Snow Mountains in Diqing Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan; also written 梅里雪山[Mei2 li3 Xue3 shan1]

雪山獅子.definition: Snow lion, mythological animal, a banned symbol of Tibet and Tibetan Buddhism

雪山獅子旗.definition: Snow lion banner, banned flag of Tibetan independence movement, featuring mythological Snow Leopard

雪嶽山.definition: Seoraksan, mountain near Sokcho, South Korea

雪恥.definition: to take revenge for a past insult; to expunge a disgrace or humiliation

雪泥.definition: dirty snow; slush; abbr. for 雪泥鴻爪|雪泥鸿爪[xue3 ni2 hong2 zhao3]

雪泥鴻爪.definition: a goose's footprint in the snow; vestiges of the past (idiom); the fleeting nature of human life (idiom)

雪糕.definition: ice cream bar; ice cream popsicle

雪茄頭.definition: cigarette lighter plug (inserted in a car's cigarette lighter socket to draw power)

雪菜.definition: see 雪裡蕻|雪里蕻[xue3 li3 hong2]

雪萊.definition: Shelley; abbr. for 珀西·比希·雪萊|珀西·比希·雪莱[Po4 xi1 · Bi3 xi1 · Xue3 lai2]

雪藏.definition: to keep sth in cold storage; (fig.) to suspend a performer or sports player (as punishment); to keep sb or sth out of sight until the right moment (e.g. a key player on a sports team)

雪裡紅.definition: variant of 雪裡蕻|雪里蕻[xue3li3hong2]

雪車.definition: vehicle designed for use in snow (sled, sleigh, bobsled, snowmobile etc)

雪雁.definition: (bird species of China) snow goose (Anser caerulescens)

雪頓.definition: Lhasa Shoton festival or yogurt banquet, from first of July of Tibetan calendar

雪頓節.definition: Lhasa Shoton festival or yogurt banquet, from first of July of Tibetan calendar

雪鴞.definition: (bird species of China) snowy owl (Bubo scandiacus)

雪鴿.definition: (bird species of China) snow pigeon (Columba leuconota)

雪鵐.definition: (bird species of China) snow bunting (Plectrophenax nivalis)

雪鶉.definition: (bird species of China) snow partridge (Lerwa lerwa)
